tool_description: Analyzes structured reading history to extract user preferences across genres, authors, themes, and reading characteristics.

book_titles.description: List of book titles from reading history

authors.description: List of author names corresponding to books

min_rating_threshold.description: Minimum rating to consider as positive preference (1-5)

analysis_depth.description: Level of preference analysis: basic, detailed, or comprehensive

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: book_titles, authors, and ratings must have the same length.
Invalid rating values: Ratings must be between 1 and 5.
Invalid threshold: min_rating_threshold must be between 1 and 5.
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [basic, detailed, comprehensive].
Insufficient data: Need at least 3 rated books for meaningful preference extraction.
usage: Provide matched arrays of book_titles, authors, and ratings. Optionally set min_rating_threshold and analysis_depth. Returns extracted preference profiles.

preferred_genres.description: List of preferred genres based on high-rated books

preferred_authors.description: List of preferred authors based on ratings

average_rating.description: User's average rating across all books

genre_scores.description: Preference scores for different genres (0-1 scale)

reading_diversity.description: Measure of reading diversity across genres (0-1 scale)
